member.name: T:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race
member.summary: This class represents the 'Race' table of .mdf file.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the Race. This is the primary key.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Rtrack
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of track, where this Race was organized.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Ryear
member.summary: Gets or sets the year of this Race.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Serie
member.summary: Gets or sets the serie, in which this Race was organized.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Sumracers
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of Racers participated to this event.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Sumlaps
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of laps.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Winnerid
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the winner.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.RtrackNavigation
member.summary: Gets or sets the track, where this race was organized.

member.name: P:RacersDB.Data.Models.Race.Winner
member.summary: Gets or sets the Winner of this Race.
